channel.title: Hello, I'm Aditya from Resumonk
channel.description:
Hello, I'm [Aditya Babbar][1], Co-Founder of [Resumonk][2]. It helps in creating a beautiful & impressive resume quickly. Number of paying customers is increasing steadily every month and hopefully it would be a fully sustainable business for us soon!
Before Resumonk, I also created a SaaS product targeted towards Indian schools as a solo founder. It also has paying customers, and that venture taught me some invaluable lessons.
I also do consulting work on the side and we are based in Delhi, India.
I'd look forward to exchanging notes with all of you and sharing our bootstrapping experience.
[1]: https://www.resumonk.com/aditya [2]: https://www.resumonk.com

item.title: Hello, I'm Aditya from Resumonk
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Aditya. Welcome to the forums!

item.title: Hello, I'm Aditya from Resumonk
item.dc:creator: aditya
item.description:
Hello,
I’m Aditya Babbar, Co-Founder of Resumonk. It helps in creating a beautiful & impressive resume quickly. Number of paying customers is increasing steadily every month and hopefully it would be a fully sustainable business for us soon!

Before Resumonk, I also created a SaaS product targeted towards Indian schools as a solo founder. It also has paying customers, and that venture taught me some invaluable lessons.

I also do consulting work on the side and we are based in Delhi, India.

I’d look forward to exchanging notes with all of you and sharing our bootstrapping experience.

Read full topic
